alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Jefferson (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 1:42PM MST until February 16 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total new snow accumulations up to 3 inches. * WHERE...Jefferson and Central and Southern Lewis and Clark Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Another fast moving weather system will produce new snowfall overnight, moving north to south through Wednesday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Jefferson
